name: Arjun Mehra
message: Major traffic collision on C-Hexagon near the main India Gate circle. Multiple vehicles involved, I am trapped in my car.

name: Sana Ali
message: A family member has collapsed near the Children's Park, possibly heatstroke. Needs urgent medical attention.

name: Vikram Rathore
message: Suspicious unattended bag found near the boating club on the east side of India Gate. Authorities need to be alerted.

name: Neha Sharma
message: A large tree branch has fallen on the road on Shahjahan Road, blocking traffic and narrowly missing pedestrians. Help needed to clear it.
